page.title: 16THE BLACKSMITH
page.content: The blacksmith in Kirkburton has been working since 1949.He started being a blacksmith because he liked horses when he was young.He has not worked anywhere else while being a blacksmith The place where the blacksmith works was built in 1915.It used to be an old house and you can still see the remains of the stair case and the mantle piece.He is the only blacksmith in his family and he says he would not change his job for another one.He does hotshoeing and coldshoeing.He shoes about 5 to 6 horses a day.One of the serious accidents is where he broke his finger when a horse trod on it and it will not mend.Sometimes he makes brackets for shelves but he does not make a lot of gates for he has not got the time.
